gui.components

Interface AbstractJListExtended<E>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - The type of elements
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JListDouble, JListEntry, JListExtended

    public interface AbstractJListExtended<E>
    Declare the methods used by a JListExtended
    Author:
    MarcoForlini
